column1: Kata Robata////I can't believe it's taken me so long to write a review
column2: since I've been eating here for years. Kata is one of my fave sushi spots in town
column3: but they also have amazing "kitchen food" like oxtail ramen
column5: and lobster mac & cheese - just to name a few. They used to have a sea bass that i loved
column6: but it's no longer on the menu. Regardless
column7: everything I've had there has been delicious!
